data.name: my_shortlist
data.marketing: Show the guest's shortlisted properties in the sidebar.
data.description: Use Jomres asamodule to show the guest's shortlisted items in a sidebar. Set the asamodule task to 'my_shortlist' and as items are added to their shortlist, on the next pageload the item is added to their sidebar
data.change_log: v1.1 PHP7 related maintenance. v1.2 Modified how array contents are checked. v1.3 Documentation update.
data.author: Vince Wooll
